dom_changes.description: Updated email input type from 'text' to 'email' to enable native browser validation and optimized mobile keyboards.
Improved accessibility for the email field by adding 'aria-required' and linking it to the error message container via 'aria-describedby'.
Implemented stricter form validation by adding a minimum length constraint (8 characters) and 'aria-required' attribute to the password field.
Standardized call-to-action text from 'Create Account' to 'Sign Up' to match common industry patterns.
Enhanced button accessibility with a descriptive 'aria-label' for users relying on screen readers.
Refined UI aesthetics by increasing card interior spacing and modernizing the border radius.
Updated primary button theme color from corporate blue (#4285F4) to a more vibrant Brand Blue (#0066FF).

test_impact_analysis: CRITICAL: Form validation logic must be updated to handle the new 8-character minimum password requirement.
FUNCTIONAL: Tests relying on generic 'text' input behavior for the email field may need to account for 'email' type validation.
VISUAL: Significant layout shifts in the .card component and button color updates will trigger visual regression failures.
ACCESSIBILITY: New ARIA attributes must be verified for correct screen reader announcement and mapping.
new_tests_recommended: Add functional test to verify error message visibility when 'minlength' constraint is violated.
Implement an automated accessibility audit to validate the new ARIA associations.
Update visual regression snapshots to reflect the modernized card and button styles.
Add mobile-specific test to ensure the 'email' input type correctly triggers the email-optimized keyboard layout.
